Howbeit<WG1161> many<WG4183> of them which heard<WG191> the word<WG3056> believed<WG4100>; and<WG2532> the number<WG706> of the men<WG435> was<WG1096> about<WG5616> five<WG4002> thousand<WG5505>.

Be it<WG2077> known<WG1110> unto you<WG5213> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> to all<WG3956> the people<WG2992> of Israel<WG2474>, that<WG3754> by<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> of Nazareth<WG3480>, whom<WG3739> ye<WG5210> crucified<WG4717>, whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, even by<WG1722> him<WG5129> doth<WG3936> this man<WG3778> stand here<WG3936> before<WG1799> you<WG5216> whole<WG5199>.

This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the stone<WG3037> which<WG3588> was set at nought<WG1848> of<WG5259> you<WG5216> builders<WG3618>, which<WG3588> is become<WG1096> the head<WG2776> of<WG1519> the corner<WG1137>.

So<WG1161> when they had further threatened them<WG4324>, they let<WG630> them<WG846> go<WG630>, finding<WG2147> nothing<WG3367> how<WG4459> they might punish<WG2849> them<WG846>, because<WG1223> of the people<WG2992>: for<WG3754> all<WG3956> men glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316> for<WG1909> that which was done<WG1096>.

And<WG1161> being let go<WG630>, they went<WG2064> to<WG4314> their own company<WG2398>, and<WG2532> reported<WG518> all<WG3745> that the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> elders<WG4245> had said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>.

And<WG1161> when they heard that<WG191>, they lifted up<WG142> their voice<WG5456> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> with one accord<WG3661>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, Lord<WG1203>, thou<WG4771> art God<WG2316>, which<WG3588> hast made<WG4160> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> the sea<WG2281>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that in<WG1722> them is<WG846>:
